response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it could transform your operations or personal endeavors in remarkable ways. Considering its worth to you, I propose a purchase price of $900,000. This offer is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing the value we receive for this exceptional product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss further details to finalize this exciting opportunity.", "product_price": 900000}
